name: Desdoble
description:
Desdoble is an action-platformer where you and the Great Old One, Cthulhu, must team up to free your souls and save the world. However, there’s one problem: You’re stuck in the same body!

Created as a student project by second year Game Development students at the Niagara College of Applied Arts & Technology

Credits:

  • Curtis Hagan
  • Jake Hardy
  • Dillan Myers
  • Myles Vanevery
  • Nico Vargas
  • Robert Witlox
